bibl.title: Papyri Graecae Schøyen (PSchøyen II). Essays and Texts in Honour of Martin Schøyen. With an Introduction by James M. ROBINSON. (Manuscripts in the Schøyen Collection. V. Greek Papyri. Volume II = Papyrologica Florentina. XL.)
bibl.biblScope: 1 front. coul., figg. et 22 pll. coul.
bibl.note: P. Schøyen II, 26-34. - Pp. ix: Prefazione (D.M. e R.P.); - xi: Introduction (J.M.R.). - Texts [26: Leviticus; - 27-33: Greek Documents; - 34: Demotic Letter] (Kristin DE TROYER, Gabriella MESSERI, R.P., D.M., Angiolo MENCHETTI). - Essays [6 contributions, none of papyrological interest].
